text: Hi all-- I'm Drew, recently a student at Berkeley (using a lattice on zebrafish), then a postdoc with Liqun Luo at Stanford (using a LaVision UMII), and now a scientist at Cajal Neuro in Seattle (using a Blaze). Happy to be a part of this group, thanks to Sam Golden for telling me about it!

elements.text: Hi all-- I'm Drew, recently a student at Berkeley (using a lattice on zebrafish), then a postdoc with Liqun Luo at Stanford (using a LaVision UMII), and now a scientist at Cajal Neuro in Seattle (using a Blaze). Happy to be a part of this group, thanks to Sam Golden for telling me about it!
